name: A Beginner's Guide To Bitcoin
description:
Learn to make money in Bitcoin, even if you've never traded before.


Bitcoin is the greatest investment opportunity of our lifetime.


Are you ready to get your piece of it?


This book will teach you everything that you need to get started investing in Bitcoin.


Bitcoin is the biggest revolution since the internet.


It’s been the best performing asset of the past decade.


Is it too late to invest?


Certainly not, if Bitcoin is going to $500,000 in the next 5 years, as many smart investors believe.


Bitcoin is a giant, super-secure bank in the cloud that you can use to store and grow your wealth.


Bitcoin is like the mutant offspring of a bar of gold and a tech stock.


It’s volatile, it has huge upside, and it’s poorly understood.


Many people still think that it is a scam, a bubble, or that it will be banned by the government.


They could not be more wrong.


U.S. regulators have recently allowed U.S. banks to custody Bitcoin.


You can now legally buy Bitcoin using PayPal or the Cash App.


Retails investors are snapping up the limited supply of just 21 million Bitcoin.


Even more important, there is a giant wall of institutional money headed towards Bitcoin. Wall Street, billionaires, and even blue chip corporations are getting in on the game.


If you missed out on the internet, make sure you don’t miss out on the Bitcoin revolution.


There are still huge amounts of money to be made.


Bitcoin is just getting started, and 2021 will be a year like no other.


As central banks continue to print money, you need a place to store your wealth and protect it from inflation.


This book will teach you everything you need to know to get started investing in Bitcoin today.


Don't gamble with your hard-earned money.


If you are going to make a lot of money, you need to know how Bitcoin really works.


You need to avoid the pitfalls and costly mistakes that beginners make.


And you need a conservative approach to Bitcoin that will help you to survive the volatility.


This book gives you everything that you will need.


It's a simple Bitcoin road map that anyone can follow.


In this book, you will learn:
- Why Bitcoin is not a bubble or a scam
- What makes Bitcoin different from other cryptocurrencies
- The best way to buy Bitcoin
- How to store your Bitcoin securely
- Why Bitcoin will not be banned by the U.S. government
- How professional investors approach Bitcoin
- The one thing you should never do when buying Bitcoin (don't start investing until you read this)
- How to create a secure financial future using Bitcoin
- And much, much more
Even if you know nothing at all about cryptocurrencies, this book will get you started investing the right way.


Join the thousands of smart traders and investors who have profited from this ultimate guide to Bitcoin.


Amazon best-selling author and retired hedge fund manager, Matthew Kratter will teach you how professional investors invest in Bitcoin.


Even if you are a complete beginner, this book will bring you up to speed in no time.


Are you ready to get started creating real wealth using Bitcoin?


Then scroll up and click BUY NOW to get started today.
